items.title: Cadillac, Ford, Nissan and Lutz Win Design Awards
items.abstract: The annual Eyes on Design Awards for design excellence at the Detroit auto show were presented to four winners on Tuesday night.
keywords: Cadillac Division of General Motors Corp

items.title: A Satellite Show at the Venice Architecture Biennale, Hosted Through (and Inspired by) Airbnb
items.abstract: A pop-up exhibition during this year’s biennial is being held not in a palazzo but in an Airbnb-rented flat — which also provided thematic fodder for the works on view.

items.title: New York City Starts $5 Million Fund for Women in Film and Theater
items.abstract: The Mayor’s Office of Media and Entertainment will create the fund, administered over five years, to help with projects “by, for, or about women.”
keywords: Mayor's Office of Media and Entertainment
Made in New York Media Center by IFP

items.title: Race Rears Its Head as New York City Council Elects New Leader
items.abstract: Councilman Corey Johnson, a white man, was elected City Council speaker, and questions about race and power remain.

items.title: Three Venerated Design Companies Look Back to Move Forward
items.abstract: Beginning again with the textile giant Maharam, the fabric line Fermoie and the furniture designer and interior architect Christian Liaigre.
